[vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1459848263527{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The homelike quality of our school contributes to a relaxed, focused experience for the child. Our indoor classroom activities are placed on open shelves for selection as interest and readiness inspires the child. Our outdoor environment offers a beautiful developed playground with manipulatives, tricycles, pets, and gardens.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1459422866800{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_separator color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#ff7264″ css=”.vc_custom_1459423949716{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”32″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1459423187199{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
